contentList.content: Every turn while in combat, you generate [1] <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_CHARGED_LIGHTNING">Lightning Charges</LSTag>.
When you deal Cold damage, you inflict [1] turns of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="WET">Wet</LSTag> on the target.
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
